name: look behind you (nospaces, evanwr)
description:
You are in a dungeon collecting gold.  A ghost is constantly following you. Shine your light to freeze the ghost, and unlock the exit to go deeper in the dungeon.

Arrow keys to move

WASD to look around

ESC to quit to the main menu

Changing movement or direction counts as a turn.

Each ghost will move towards you every turn, unless they are visible.
